metadata.title: Rune Slayer - Open World Roblox RPG Adventure
metadata.description: Rune Slayer is an immersive open-world RPG experience on Roblox where players forge alliances, master classes, tame unique pets, and craft powerful gear in a dangerous fantasy wilderness.
metadata.keywords: Rune Slayer, Roblox, RPG, open world, character classes, pet taming

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.tip: Please keep your apikey safe to avoid leaks

team2.title: Character Classes
team2.subtitle: Choose your character class wisely based on your playstyle

archer.name: Archer
archer.description: The most broken class. Archers attack from range, cause arrow rain, and Beast Tamer specialization makes them overpowered.

priest.name: Priest
priest.description: Can do ranged/melee damage and heal. Healing others and their pet puts them in a league of their own. A Priest with a powerful pet is almost unkillable.

thief.name: Thief
thief.description: Quick, deadly, powerful but lacks defense. Great for players who can dodge and parry. Stick to shadows and strike at the right moment.

magician.name: Magician
magician.description: Powerful ranged spell-slingers best in groups. Glass cannons on their own - pair with warriors or strikers for best results.

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.description: Hit hard and tank damage at the front line. Can wear powerful armor but must get close to action, which can be dangerous.

striker.name: Striker
striker.description: Least desirable class. Relies on speed to deliver fist blows but lacks defense. Easily taken out by powerful attacks. Needs future buffs.

races.title: All Rune Slayer Races
races.subtitle: Ready to start playing Rune Slayer, here are all the Races in the game and their unique passives!

list.name: Human
list.description: Humans are highly adaptable, with an exceptional ability to sustain their resources, making them well-suited for any scenario.

passive.name: Tenacity
passive.description: When below 50% hp gain 15% dmg buff and 15% dmg reduction

passive.name: Ghoul Slayer
passive.description: You deal more dmg to the undead

active.name: Surge
active.description: Harness your hunger to fuel a powerful burst of stamina.

list.name: Elf
list.description: Elves are expert hunters, boasting a superior capacity for precision and endurance compared to other races. Masters of stealth, they excel at remaining unseen.

list.name: Orc
list.description: Orcs possess incredible vitality and resilience, allowing them to endure harsh conditions that would debilitate other races.

list.name: Ailuran
list.description: Catfolk known for their agility and natural dexterity. Their heightened reflexes and balance make them exceptional hunters and scouts.

list.name: Slime
list.description: Amorphous beings with incredible adaptability. Their malleable bodies can absorb and repurpose various substances encountered in the world.

passive.name: Fluid Form
passive.description: -7.5% magic resistance, -7.5% fire resistance, +25% status ailment resistance

passive.name: Mitosis
passive.description: Chance to spawn smaller slimes when hit

active.name: Viscous Blast
active.description: Release a powerful slime wave at the cost of some health

features.name: Toxic Evolution
features.description: Transform into deadly black ooze with enhanced toxicity and improved 'Viscous Blast'

features.name: Absorption
features.description: Slime hitting targets provides healing, absorbed slime restores mana

list.name: Half Golem
list.description: Part flesh, part stone constructs. Their partially mineral bodies grant them exceptional durability at the cost of mobility.

passive.name: Stone Flesh
passive.description: -5% maximum speed, +5% damage reduction, +10 maximum weight capacity, +25% stability

racialUpgrades.name: Living Fortress
racialUpgrades.effects: -10% speed, +10% damage reduction, +5% magic resistance, +25 maximum weight capacity, +25% stability

racialUpgrades.name: Stone Striker
racialUpgrades.effects: +12% attack power, +6% speed, -10% damage reduction, +25% stability

racialUpgrades.name: Runic Vessel
racialUpgrades.effects: +12% magic power, +6% speed, -10% damage reduction, +25% stability

list.name: Dullahan
list.description: Headless undead warriors bound to unlife by ancient curses. Their spectral nature grants them unique abilities and resilience.

passive.name: Soul Harvest
passive.description: Restore a small amount of health when killing enemies

active.name: Detached Perception
active.description: Remove your head to use as a viewing tool

active.name: Reaper's Charge
active.description: Dash forward with a scythe swing
